ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Status__c), OR( AND(TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Status__c)) = "Sold", TEXT(Status__c) = "Available"), AND(TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Status__c)) = "Withdrawn", TEXT(Status__c) = "Under Contract") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid status change. Sold properties cannot be made available, and withdrawn properties cannot go directly under contract.
